thread.title: RBS reaches $4.9 bln deal to settle U.S. investigation

title: RBS reaches $4.9 bln deal to settle U.S. investigation
text:
RBS reaches $4.9 bln deal to settle U.S. investigation 25
Royal Bank of Scotland has agreed to pay a smaller-than-expected $4.9 billion to resolve a U.S. investigation into its sale of mortgage-backed securities, paving the way for a long-awaited return of cash to UK taxpayers who bankrolled its post-crisis survival. David Pollard reports.
Royal Bank of Scotland has agreed to pay a smaller-than-expected $4.9 billion to resolve a U.S. investigation into its sale of mortgage-backed securities, paving the way for a long-awaited return of cash to UK taxpayers who bankrolled its post-crisis survival. David Pollard reports. //reut.rs/2G1fAEL
